audioText: Leur amour grandissait nullement malgré les difficultés rencontrées ensemble au cours de cette période troublée.
question: How did their love grow despite the difficulties?
explanation: The text states 'Leur amour grandissait nullement malgré les difficultés rencontrées ensemble au cours de cette période troublée.' - 'Their love was not growing at all despite the difficulties encountered together during this troubled period.' The adverb 'nullement' means 'not at all' or 'in no way', indicating their love was not growing.
